0.title: Gym, Tan, Look Back
0.plot: The cast takes final look back at their journey of the last three years. Through interviews, America's favorite roommates tell the stories that only they can tell and relive unforgetable moments. Includes a season 6 sneak peek.

1.title: Once More Unto the Beach
1.plot: Everyone returns to the shore for one last time. The Situation comes clean about his recovery and Snooki faces the challenge of being pregnant in a party house.

2.title: No Shame, Good Integrity
2.plot: The roommates settle in to life at the shore and Deena copes with being away from her boyfriend. Nicole makes an announcement that shocks the house.

3.title: Toxic Shots Syndrome
3.plot: Snooki moves out of the shore house to be on her own and Deena struggles without her meatball. Mike deals with the downside of his recovery after receiving treatment from a doctor.

4.title: Blues, Balls & Brawls
4.plot: Snooki moves out of the shore house to be on her own and Deena struggles without her meatball. Mike deals with the downside of his recovery after receiving treatment from a doctor.

5.title: Merp Walk
5.plot: Jenni learns the full extent of her injury. Mike considers taking things with Paula to the next level. When Deena holds Meatball Auditions, she ends up rolling out of the sauce pan and into the fire.

6.title: Let's Make It Official
6.plot: Jenni plans a "Shore Shower" for Nicole and invites all the roommates. The guys support Mike's decision to dump Paula and tag along for a front row seat to all the action.

7.title: Great Meatballs of Fire
7.plot: Mike adjusts to being in a relationship and gets confused about the rules. Deena goes back to her meatball ways, but has to fight for her right to party.

8.title: Control the Crazy
8.plot: Sammi confronts Deena about her meatball antics and the two of them go head-to-head. Mike and the roommates get to know Paula's "wild" side and Mike isn't sure he can handle it.

9.title: Make It Unofficial
9.plot: Jenni plans a "Shore Shower" for Nicole and invites all the roommates. The guys support Mike's decision to dump Paula and tag along for a front row seat to all the action.

10.title: Shore Shower
10.plot: MVP is back, resulting in a near threesome for Vinny. The gang runs into Angelina at a club. The girls struggle to keep the baby shower a surprise for Nicole, and Vinny is nervous about Jionni seeing him at the party.

11.title: Awkward!
11.plot: Vinny talks to Jionni and they resolve their differences, leaving Vin and Nicole free to resume their friendship. Meanwhile, Mike finally acknowledges the mistakes he made in the past and attempts to make amends with Nicole.

12.title: Raining Men & Meatballs
12.plot: The Meatballs take over the boardwalk and hold auditions to find a temporary party pal for Deena. Mike reveals to the roommates that he used to be a stripper and they coax him into showing his stuff.

13.title: The Icing on the Cake
13.plot: It's the end of summer and the end of a long road for the roommates as they prepare to say their last goodbyes to Seaside.

14.title: Last Call: Live Reunion
14.plot: Join the cast in a live reunion for the last time to say goodbye and to relive the best and most shocking moments in Jersey Shore history. Hosted by Amy Paffrath.

1.title: A New Family
1.plot: Summer at the Jersey Shore kicks off when eight house mates move into their summer share. Romance heats up between Sammy and Mike, but all might be lost when the guys invite three random girls to join them in the hot tub.

2.title: The Tanned Triangle
2.plot: Still feeling like the outcast, Snookie tells the others that she's leaving the Shore. And the roommates' first night out at the club gets flirty, proving that the boyfriends back home might have something to worry about.

3.title: Good Riddance
3.plot: The love triangle gets even more intense when Ronnie catches Sammy giving her number to another guy. And a housemate chooses to leave the Shore for good.

4.title: Fade to Black
4.plot: After a night of partying at the clubs, Mike "The Situation" and Pauly D. juggle with multiple groups of girls. Meanwhile, Snooki's mother comes to visit and spend some quality time together. When Mrs. Polizzi leaves, Snooki becomes very emotional showing her "true colors". That same night at the bar, all hell breaks loose when one of the housemates goes down.

5.title: Just Another Day at the Shore
5.plot: Snookie's violent encounter at the bar brings the housemates closer together and she finally feels like she is a part of the family. Meanwhile, Ronnie and Sammy's relationship reaches new heights.

6.title: Boardwalk Blowups
6.plot: Mike "The Situation" invites two girls to the shore house, but things get out of control, and Snooki gets into her second fight of the summer. Meanwhile, Ronnie has a brawl of his own, leaving Sammi to put their relationship into question.

7.title: What Happens in AC
7.plot: The roommates head to Atlantic City where fun turn to fury when Mike manages to antagonize both Snooki and Jwoww. And one roommate reveals that she used to have an eating disorder.

8.title: One Shot
8.plot: The summer's winding down, but the drama doesn't stop. Pauly's got a stalker and a fight lands another roommate in jail.

9.title: That's How the Shore Goes
9.plot: Ronnie is released from his night in the slammer and the guys comfort Snooki after she has a bad encounter with her ex-boyfriend. The housemates wrap things up at the Shore as summer draws to a close, but not before one final house hot tub hook up.

10.title: Jersey Shore Reunion
10.plot: On Jersey Shore: The Reunion, Snooki and Vinny define their relationship, JWoww tells us how she really feels about Roger, Deena clears up some rumors...for the record and Sammi and Ronnie talk about why they just couldn't make it work.

11.title: Before the Shore
11.plot: Ever ask the question, "Are these kids for real?" Discover, through previously unseen footage Snooki, Mike, JWOWW, Pauly D, Ronnie, Sammi, Angelina, and Vinny before their drama filled summer at the Jersey Shore.

0.title: GTL: Miami
0.plot: Mike, Pauly, Vinny, and Ronnie take us on a tour of the best GTL spots in Miami.

1.title: Going South
1.plot: The cast sets up house in Miami, and Ronnie upsets Samantha by flirting with other girls in the club.

2.title: The Hangover
2.plot: Sammi tries to figure out what Ronnie REALLY did at the club the night before, but no one is saying. And when Angelina interrupts Pauly's game, we see a whole new side of the usually calm Pauly D.

3.title: Creepin'
3.plot: Angelina swallows her pride and apologizes to the girls. Back at the house, Mike, Vinny and Pauly have a close encounter with grenades in the hot tub, while Ron continues to creep behind Sammi's back.

4.title: Breaking Up
4.plot: Ron's bad behavior puts Snooki, Angelina and Jwoww in a tough spot. Together the girls decide to write an "anonymous" letter to Sammi and finally reveal the entire truth.

5.title: The Letter
5.plot: Sammi finds Snooki and Jenni's "anonymous" letter, and this time it's really over with Ronnie -- at least for now. Meanwhile, Mike, Vinny and Pauly ("MVP") have their hands full juggling four girls in one night.

6.title: Not So Shore
6.plot: The anonymous note causes tension between the girls, culminating in a full-blown cat-fight. After spending another night in bed with Vinny, Snooki reveals a not-so-little known fact about her pinkeye-prone cuddle-buddy.

7.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
7.plot: The roommates deal with fallout from the girl-fight; Angelina starts dating Jose, a guy from the club; and Jenni and Snooki don homemade haz-mat suits to clean up the smush room in preparation for Snooki's hook-up.

8.title: All in the Family
8.plot: When news gets out that Angelina and Vinny hooked up, Mike threatens to spill the beans to the Jose. Vinny's family comes to visit. And Vinny and Pauly find the girls of their dreams, but one of their hearts will be broken.

9.title: Dirty Pad
9.plot: Things go south for Angelina when the house learns she slept with Jose after smushing Vin. Then she gets too close to a guy Snooki hooked up with. But it's the last straw when Mike discovers more unpleasantness in the bathroom.

10.title: Gone, Baby, Gone
10.plot: Mike reunites with his Canadian hottie, providing entertainment for the whole house. And Angelina tells her roommates how she really feels about them, sending Snooki into a frenzy and finally pushing things over the edge.

11.title: Girls Like That
11.plot: Vinny decides between two sets of girls. And with Angelina gone, Snooki thinks it's time that she and Jenni bury the hatchet with Sam. But Snooki's happiness is short-lived as Mike becomes increasingly belligerent with her.

12.title: Deja Vu All Over Again
12.plot: Everyone is frustrated with Mike for being off his game - he gets the roommates kicked out of a club, gets the car towed, practically burns down the house, and proves to be a failure as a wingman for Pauly. Twice!

13.title: Back Into the Fold
13.plot: Pauly and Vin each have a final date with their Miami girls, while Sam and Ron's last supper quickly devolves into a fight. Then Jenni stirs things up between Pauly and Mike, leading to a drama-filled final night in the hot tub.

14.title: Reunion
14.plot: The cast of the Jersey Shore are back together to dish the dirt on Miami. From bromance and romance to the infamous note and the fights that followed, the cast tells all.

0.title: Aftershows
0.plot: The housemates talk about the drama in the house. Angelina is confronted after deciding to leave the house.

1.title: Back to the Shore
1.plot: Even though they're still experiencing some fallout from "the note" in Miami, nothing can stop the family dinners, G.T.L and gorilla hunting that have bonded them from the beginning. All seven roomies agree they are glad to be back and that Angelina is gone. Too bad none of them know Snooki has invited her BFF Deena Nicole Cortese to fill the void.

2.title: It's Gonna Be an Interesting Summer
2.plot: The fight between Sammi and Jwoww causes tension in the house. Ronnie and Sammi continue to isolate themselves. When Ronnie finally decides to hang out and have fun with the rest of the house, Sammi feels all alone.

3.title: Where's the Beach
3.plot: Sammi decides to make peace with Snooki and Deena. Jwoww runs into her old flame Roger and sparks fly. And Snooki gets arrested for public intoxication.

4.title: Free Snooki
4.plot: Snooki is bailed out of jail after her incident at the beach. JWoww continues to meet with Roger, and starts to develop feelings for him. At the club, Deena meets Ronnie's "stunt double" but realizes he's in a relationship. JWoww gets into a heated argument with Tom, thus ending their relationship. When JWoww heads to her house with Snooki, she finds that her dogs are alone and some of her things have been stolen.

5.title: Drunk Punch Love
5.plot: Ronnie and Jwoww make up leading to Sammi punching Ronnie in the face. Vinny picks up a girl with an overbearing family. And Mike learns Deena's dirty little secret.

6.title: Should We Just Break Up?
6.plot: Ronnie's over-drinking causes some painful side effects. Snooki meets a guy who may or may not be engaged. And Pauly makes peace with an old nemesis

7.title: Cabs Are Here!
7.plot: Ronnie and Sammi's tumultuous relationship comes to an end. When Ronnie destroys everything Sammi owns, she must decide whether or not to leave the Shore.

8.title: The Great Depression
8.plot: After Sammi leaves the house, Ronnie is an emotional wreck. With the girls taking Sammi's side and the guys not knowing how to cheer him up, Ronnie feels like he has no friends left in the house.

9.title: Kissing Cousins
9.plot: Snooki's summer of hookups comes back to haunt her. Mike pulls the ultimate prank on Deena and Snooki. But the rest of the guys have the last laugh, ditching Mike for taking too long to get ready for dinner.

10.title: A Cheesy Situation
10.plot: Sammi's return to the Shore house leaves Ronnie at a loss for words. Snooki's feelings for Vinny continue to deepen. Mike hooks up with a girl who he's convinced smells like cheese but doesn't realize he's been pranked.

11.title: Gym, Tan, Find Out Who Sammi Is Texting
11.plot: Vinny and Pauly take a road trip to Staten Island. Roger becomes more than just a rebound for Jwoww. Mike reveals Sammi's shady ways, causing Ronnie to question his love for her.

12.title: A House Divided
12.plot: Mike continues to instigate drama between Ronnie and Sammi. Snooki has a falling out with Vinny. And Deena gets upset at Pauly and Vin for trying to hook up with her friend at the end-of-summer party.

13.title: At the End of the Day
13.plot: While one couple reaches a crossroads in their relationship, another couple makes it official. The roommates say goodbye to another summer at the Jersey Shore.

14.title: Reunion Special
14.plot: On Jersey Shore: The Reunion, Snooki and Vinny define their relationship, JWoww tells us how she really feels about Roger, Deena clears up some rumors...for the record and Sammi and Ronnie talk about why they just couldn't make it work.

0.title: From the First Fist Pump
0.plot: An entertaining look back at the first three seasons of Jersey Shore -- complete with all the comedy, drama, mischievous antics, and water cooler moments that keep people talking.

1.title: Going to Italia
1.plot: The housemates pack up their hair extensions and their Shore Store t-shirts and jet off to Italy for a European adventure. But the culture-shock that awaits them is nothing compared to their shocking new hook-ups.

2.title: Like More Than a Friend
2.plot: Deena and Pauly consider the consequences should they smush, while Mike tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. Ron and Sammi try to be friends but prove that old habits--both good and bad--die hard.

3.title: Twinning
3.plot: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as "Bi-curious" Deena pulls the robbery on Mike AND Vinny. Plus Mike's secret "hookup" with Snooki is revealed. Is Snooki a cheater or is The Situation just trying to start drama?

4.title: Crime and Punishment
4.plot: The boys harass Deena for stealing a girl from Vinny's bed, leading her to anxiety and self doubt about her relationship with the roommates. Ronnie & Sam are back to their old ways, but this time Mike is involved in their mess.

5.title: And the Wall Won
5.plot: After causing drama between Ron and Sam for years, Mike comes to blows with Ronnie. But with Mike carried out on a stretcher, have things finally gone too far? And is Sam and Ron's relationship now beyond repair?

6.title: Fist Pump, Pushups, Chapstick
6.plot: Pauly and Vinny put on a "Guido-themed" comedy show, while Ron and Sam work once again to patch things up. Snooki becomes so distraught over her rollercoaster long-distance relationship that Jenni and Sam decide to intervene.

7.title: Meatball Mashup
7.plot: When the roommates take a trip to the Italian Shore, Snooki and Deena party so hard they wind up in bed together. And when everyone returns to Florence, Team Meatballs have a run in with the Italian police-literally.

8.title: Where Is My Boyfriend?
8.plot: The boys spring Team Meatballs from the police station after their accident. And when Snooki's true love Jionni comes to visit, what starts as a romantic evening ends with a sobbing Snooki alone in the streets of Florence.

9.title: Three Men and a Snooki
9.plot: Deena panics after missing her period. Snooki wakes up devastated after an all-night fight with Jionni. When she decides to take a break from the relationship, Mike tries to win her over, but someone else ends up comforting her.

10.title: Damage Is Done
10.plot: After Mike's prank on Snooki backfires, the guys visit Vinny's family in Sicily and the girls class it up on a Tuscan wine tour. Snooki learns the truth from Vinny about their hook-up, and now she has to come clean to Jionni.

11.title: Situation Problems
11.plot: Deena's still trying to "do sex" with Pauly. The meatballs get an icy reception at a club. And the whole house turns on Mike, after he stirs up drama one too many times.

12.title: Ciao, Italia
12.plot: Mike's antics have finally proven too much for the roommates and Ron demands he make amends. But as the crew counts down the days until their return to Seaside, Mike wonders whether or not to join them back on the Jersey Shore.

13.title: Reunion
13.plot: After a summer full of popping and breaking bottles, heartache, "lesbionic" hookups, and car-crashing, wall-smashing drama, the cast reunites to open up old wounds and say goodbye to Florence in this explosive reunion.

1.title: Hurricane Situation
1.plot: The roommates return from Italy and couldn't be more excited to get back to the Jersey Shore. But a drama storm is brewing as Mike threatens to destroy Snooki's relationship with Jionni.

2.title: One Man Down
2.plot: Vinny weighs his options - stay at the Jersey Shore house or head home to Staten Island. Snooki fights with Jionni and the roommates are back to their usual antics - partying and tanning to the extreme.

3.title: Dropping Like Flies
3.plot: The roommates struggle to adjust to life at the Shore without Vinny, while Mike confronts his own internal demons. But it's also Pauly's birthday and he gets the best present of his life!

4.title: Free Vinny
4.plot: Mike returns only to find out that Danny has threatened to get new roommates! The girls hire strippers for Pauly and Mike's wild birthday party. The roomies go to Staten Island to kidnap Vinny. But will he go back with them?

5.title: Nothing But Nice
5.plot: Vinny returns and everyone celebrates. Mike tries hard to be nice but winds up annoying the boys. Snooki struggles with an uncomfortable condition.

6.title: The Follow Game
6.plot: The Situation secretly gathers information to bring down one of his roommates, and for once it isn't Snooki. JWoww is freaking out because Roger has disappeared and won't return her calls.

7.title: Love at the Jersey Shore
7.plot: "The Situation" contemplates settling down, and an argument leads to one of the most explosive cliffhangers ever.

8.title: Sharp Objects
8.plot: The cast tries to avoid a shark attack when they go fishing. Jenni confronts Pauly's stalker. Snooki sets her sights on Vinny when her boyfriend rejects her affections.

9.title: The Truth Will Set You Free
9.plot: Mike decides he can wait no longer to reveal "the truth" to Snooki's boyfriend. Pauly, Vinny, and Deena find it difficult to be the single roommates in the Shore House.

10.title: One Meatball Stands Alone
10.plot: A battle royale breaks out after Mike reveals to Jionni that he hooked up with Snooki. Deena faces the hard truth about Joey. Some of the roommates go camping while Vinny and Pauly pull the greatest prank in Shore history!

11.title: We Are Family
11.plot: As the roommates prepare to leave, Mike starts a rumor about Deena's sister, Pauly and Vinny prank the house, and the Storm of the Century hits the Shore.

12.title: Reunion
12.plot: The drama continues when the Jersey Shore house mates get together to relive the highs and lows of the past summer.

-1.title: Best of Reunions
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Jersey Shore
plot: A reality-based look at the vapid lives of several New Jersey 20-somethings and their respective friends and/or hook-ups.::tb4000
synopsis: The gang still misses Vinny, who has gone back home to his mother. Nobody really misses The Situation, who has disappeared because everybody ignored his birthday. Later, the not-so-spectacular six get a visit from Danny, who is upset that he is short workers and that those workers he does have are lazy and terrible. He says to "make room" for roommates.  She doesn't want anyone coming into the house and "#@%&# things up," Snooki says.The Situation then returns to the house and lets it be known that he is upset that everyone "forgot" his birthday. Snooki lets it be known that nobody "forgot." The next day, Snooki, Deena and Vinny head to work. Snooki is extra motivated because she does not want new roommates. Vinny is shocked to see the extra effort -- or any effort. Snooki and Deena then get temporary tattoos before heading home. Deena calls Vinny to see if he wants to come to Pauly's surprise birthday party. Vinny doesn't commit to anything.The ladies then take off to Karma to plan Pauly's surprise party. They meet a creepy stripper wrangler who assures the women that his employees "aren't shy." Well, thank goodness for that. Back at the house, Ronnie and The Situation head to work ... and they're late, of course. So Danny puts up a "help wanted" sign. A string of young Shoreians come in to apply, infuriating JWoww. She doesn't want a new roommate either. Nor does Ronnie, who vows to make any new roomie feel terribly unwelcome and uncomfortable.Snooki and Deena, in the meantime, head to the store to buy party balloons ... and bunny suits (not Playboy bunnies, but giant Easter bunnies). Weird. Hours later, the gang heads to Karma -- and Pauly and The Situation are SHOCKED to find all their friends waiting. So it's a dual party. Pauly gets a breast-shaped cake and The Situation gets a buttocks-shaped cake. "I feel really nice right now that the girls planned this great birthday," The Situation says. Soon, the strippers show up and handcuff the birthday boys to their chairs. A pair of busty ladies then burst out of two giant cakes and start grinding. "This is the best day of my life," Pauly tells the camera.Sometime later, Pauly meets -- and quickly starts making out with -- a cute brunette. Naturally, he wants to show her his birthday suit. She agrees. The Situation, meanwhile, is making nice with his stripper. After last call, they all head back to the house. Things get weird when Ronnie begins to cry because he misses Vinny. "I don't think he's coming back," Deena opines. A few minutes later, Pauly escorts his new lady friend to a waiting cab after "birthday sex."The next morning, The Situation calls a cab and escorts the stripper outside. He doesn't remember her name. Deena then calls Ronnie's friend Joey and asks him to come to the club with her. He accepts. "I have a date!" Deena squeals. Snooki then puts on her bunny costume and leaps out of the bathroom to scare JWoww. "It's awesome!" gushes Deena. Later, Jionni arrives with fresh flowers for Snooki. Snooki immediately takes Jionni to bed. The rest of the gang heads to Bamboo, where the drinks are flowing. The roommates aren't there for more than two minutes before they notice two women rolling around on the floor. But who are the chicks in this chick fight? It's Sweetheart!Seconds later, bouncers drag Sweetheart out of the club. She tells Ronnie that someone yanked her hair from behind. "I got attacked by, like, a swarm of bitches," Sweetheart says. She is quite proud of herself for emerging relatively unscathed. But the night is effectively over so everybody heads home. Deena gets under the covers with Joey ... but her alarm clock keeps going off. Four times. Poor Deena: she can't catch a break. Or work a clock. The next morning, The Situation says goodbye to Paula, who is slowly wearing down his defenses. "I haven't found one bad thing about her yet!" he exclaims.Pauly then declares that everybody is going to Staten Island to get Vinny. "I want him to feel welcome so we're all going to make shirts with Vinny sayings on them," Pauly explains. So they head to the t-shirt store and make shirts reading: "Vinning all day" and "Free Vinny." These are Vinny sayings? Anyway, the roomies pile into the SUV and head to Vinny's abode. They barge into the house, run upstairs and find Vinny waiting. Vinny appears to be very happy to see his friends and their shirts. He then shows off his new tattoo: "Let go, let God" right across his chest. "I have no idea what it means," Ronnie tells the camera. "But it looks cool." And that's really all that matters, right?So after a week of recovering from anxiety, Vinny follows his roommates to the car. Bye, Vinny's mom, who begins to cry watching his son leave. "I'm going to get laid tonight!" Vinny exclaims as the car pulls away from his home.
